definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Goshawk circled in the mountains on the river surging with the cliffs.
sentences.chinese: 苍鹰在山峦上盘旋，江水随着绝壁激荡。

sentences.english: The hills rolled toward the horizon.
Grand Mirage Resort is a beach resort with 309 rooms which most them overlooking to the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 在酒店，您可以远眺美丽的山峦和印度洋的绝妙风光。

sentences.english: Steep mountains and high plateaus still keep most of the area unpopulated .
sentences.chinese: 陡峭的山峦和高原使这块土地的大部分至今人迹罕见。

sentences.english: Our voice reverberates across the mountains, while beauty reverberates in our heart!
sentences.chinese: 我们的呼唤在山峦回荡，美在我们心间回响。

sentences.english: Ups and downs, there are lush snow mountains and spruces .
sentences.chinese: 山峦起伏跌宕，生长着茂密的雪岭云杉，苍苍莽莽。

sentences.english: The nearby mountains are clothed in snow.
sentences.chinese: 附近的山峦盖上了白雪。

sentences.english: This wine comes from the original hilly Classico zone, in the heart of the region.
sentences.chinese: 这款酒更是产自康帝中心地带山峦起伏的区域。

sentences.english: It is located on the San Francisco Bay and nestles among the rolling hills of Northern California.
sentences.chinese: 它是坐落在旧金山湾和环抱在北加州起伏的山峦中。

sentences.english: With songs they have sung for a thousand years, The hills fill my heart with the sound of music.
sentences.chinese: 传唱千年的歌声在飘扬，山峦唤起我心中的音乐。

sentences.english: The waves were beside the daffodils and the mountains around them.
sentences.chinese: 水波潋滟，山峦重嶂，但又怎比这水仙的舞步翩跹。

sentences.english: Skirmishes and ambushes raged across the mountains and forests of Connacht.
sentences.chinese: 激烈冲突和埋伏在山峦和康诺特森林。

sentences.english: Promising holes in the clouds were visible behind me, lighting up the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 而在我身后，云层中漏下的阳光就照亮了这个山峦。

sentences.english: Range upon range of mountains are surrounded by pervading clouds. How beautiful the scene is.
sentences.chinese: 垒垒的山峦，云雾弥漫，这风景真是迷人。

sentences.english: After the peach, I look forward to working with the dark mountains.
sentences.chinese: 桃花过后，我期待着溢满黛色的山峦。

sentences.english: On the horizon, in every direction, are the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 向四周眺望，所见的地平线处均是起伏的山峦。

definition: the peaks of a mountain range
